name: Eylon Yogev
content: Eylon Yogev Eylon Yogev Bar-Ilan University Computer Science Department eylon.yogev [at] biu.ac.il Office: Building 503, Room 104 About Me I am a faculty member in the department of Computer Science at Bar-Ilan University and a member of the Bar-Ilan Center for Research in Applied Cryptography and Cyber Security. I completed my PhD at the Weizmann Institute, where I was fortunate to have been advised by Prof. Moni Naor. I am primarily interested in theoretical computer science, with a special focus on cryptography and interactive proof systems.
